guide.introduction:
After taking a flower arranging class in college, my wife likes to whip up nice flower arrangements for friends, parties, weddings, and in this case today, funerals too.

A boutonnière is a spray of flowers worn in a buttonhole. For this project, you just need some small flowers, like carnations, and large solid leaves like something from a camellia bush or lemon tree.
guide.introduction_rendered:
After taking a flower arranging class in college, my wife likes to whip up nice flower arrangements for friends, parties, weddings, and in this case today, funerals too.

A boutonnière is a spray of flowers worn in a buttonhole. For this project, you just need some small flowers, like carnations, and large solid leaves like something from a camellia bush or lemon tree.

Relevant parts
  • Floral Tape
  • Floral Wire
  • Corsage Pin
Tools
  • Side cutters

lines.text: Cut the stem off the flower with about an inch of room to spare.
lines.text_raw: Cut the stem off the flower with about an inch of room to spare.

lines.text: Cut a piece of wire about 6 inches long

lines.text: Gather a leaf or other decoration to add to the boutonnière.

lines.text: Push the wire through the leaf, and then through the thick part of the flower stem.
lines.text_raw: Push the wire through the leaf, and then through the thick part of the flower stem.

lines.text: Hook the end of the wire around the flower and the leaf.
lines.text_raw: Hook the end of the wire around the flower and the leaf.

lines.text: Wrap it all the way around the flower and stem.
lines.text_raw: Wrap it all the way around the flower and stem.

lines.text: Wrap the wire all the way down the stem.
lines.text_raw: Wrap the wire all the way down the stem.

lines.text: Start the floral tape around the top of the wire.
lines.text_raw: Start the floral tape around the top of the wire.

lines.text: Wrap the tape down the stem, around the wire.
lines.text_raw: Wrap the tape down the stem, around the wire.

lines.text: When you are finished, use a corsage pin (a pin with a pearl on it), to pin the boutonnière to your jacket, shirt or blouse.

guide.summary: Make a simple boutonnière using a carnation, a leaf from a camellia bush, some floral tape and wire.
